columns.name: OB_SU_RELEASE_INSTR_GID
columns.description: The GID for the Release Instruction associated to the order base ship unit.

columns.name: OB_SU_RELEASE_INSTR_XID
columns.description: The XID for the release instruction.

columns.name: SEQUENCE_NO
columns.description: The sequence number (key) associated with the release instruction.

columns.name: OB_SHIP_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the order base ship unit associated to the order base, null if the order base in line based.

columns.name: ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The order base GID for the release instruction.

columns.name: SHIP_UNIT_RELEASE_COUNT
columns.description: The ship unit release count specifying the amount to be processed with this release instruction.

columns.name: IS_PROCESSED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the release instruction was processed to create an order release ship unit.

columns.name: RELEASE_DATE
columns.description: The date the release instruction should be processed.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location GID for the pickup of the order base ship unit.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location GID for the delivery of the order base ship unit.

columns.name: EARLY_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be picked up. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: LATE_DELIVERY_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked up. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: EARLY_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The earliest date when the item can be delivered. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: LATE_PICKUP_DATE
columns.description: The latest date when the item can be picked delivered. If a value is specified here it overrides that one defined on the order base line.

columns.name: FLAGGED_FOR_DELETE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the release instruction can be deleted by an agent or user defined process.

columns.name: ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The number of packaged items on this ship unit release instruction.

columns.name: WEIGHT
columns.description: The weight for the release instruction.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The weight unit of measure.

columns.name: WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME
columns.description: The volume for the release instruction.

columns.name: VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The volume unit of measure.

columns.name: VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: LENGTH
columns.description: The length of the ship unit for the release instruction.

columns.name: LENGTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The length of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: LENGTH_BASE
columns.description: The length of the ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: WIDTH
columns.description: The width of the ship unit for the release instruction.

columns.name: WIDTH_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The width of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: WIDTH_BASE
columns.description: The width of the ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HEIGHT
columns.description: The height of the ship unit for the release instruction.

columns.name: HEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The height of the ship unit unit of measure.

columns.name: HEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The height of the ship unit in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total weight of the ship units for this release instruction.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume of the ship units for this release instruction.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_HANDLING_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The transport handling unit GID to be applied to the order release ship unit created with this release instruction.

columns.name: IS_AUTO_RELEASE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator to create the order release ship unit from the release instruction that comes in with the order base ship unit initially.

columns.name: TAG1
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG2
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG3
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: TAG4
columns.description: Additional information about the item. Like the color or code number.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: SHIP_WITH_GROUP
columns.description: The ship with group value that will be used when creating the order release from this release instruction.

columns.name: MASTER_ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: The master order base GID to be set on the order release created from the line. An order release can be created from multiple order bases and one of them is nominated as the master to get master level information for such as bill to party.
